text: The Romance of a Dixie Belle is a 1911 American silent film produced by Kalem Company and distributed by General Film. It was directed by Sidney Olcott with Gene Gauntier in the leading roles. ==Cast== * Gene Gauntier - Shirley ==Production notes== * The film was shot in Jacksonville, Florida. ==External links== * * The Romance of a Dixie Belle website dedicated to Sidney Olcott Category:1911 films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:American silent short films Category:Films shot in Jacksonville, Florida Category:Films directed by Sidney Olcott Category:1911 short films Category:1911 drama films Category:American black-and-white films
title: The Romance of a Dixie Belle
